mapper.select: SELECT vi.filename, vi.bukenme, vi.userid, vi.shoyusha, vi.yukokbn, vi.sakusesha, DATE_FORMAT(vi.sakusehi,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as sakusehi, vi.koushinsha, DATE_FORMAT(vi.koushinhi,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as koushinhi, vi.picnum, ui.customid FROM innodb.vr_info vi LEFT JOIN innodb.user_info ui ON vi.userid = ui.userid WHERE ui.customid = (SELECT customid FROM user_info WHERE userid = #{userid}) and vi.yukokbn = '1'

SELECT vi.filename, vi.bukenme, vi.userid, vi.shoyusha, vi.yukokbn, vi.sakusesha, DATE_FORMAT(vi.sakusehi,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as sakusehi, vi.koushinsha, DATE_FORMAT(vi.koushinhi,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as koushinhi, vi.picnum, ui.customid FROM innodb.vr_info vi LEFT JOIN innodb.user_info ui ON vi.userid = ui.userid WHERE vi.userid <> 'panolib_admin' ORDER BY ui.customid, vi.userid, vi.sakusehi ASC
mapper.update: update innodb.vr_info set filename = #{album.filename}, bukenme = #{album.bukenme}, shoyusha = #{album.shoyusha}, yukokbn = #{album.yukokbn}, koushinsha = #{album.koushinsha}, koushinhi = SYSDATE(), picnum where userid = #{album.userid}
mapper.insert: insert into innodb.vr_info ( filename, bukenme, userid, sakusehi, koushinhi, picnum ) values ( NOW(), #{bukenme}, #{userid}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), 0 )
